name: responsivo
description: A web extension for firefox allowing to view multiple view widths at once

scripts.watch: npx esbuild app.tsx --outdir=. --bundle --watch & npx esbuild background.ts --outdir=. --bundle --watch
scripts.package: mkdir -p out && cp app.js background.js 128.png manifest.json LICENSE.txt out/ && cd out/ && npx web-ext build

author: Michael Lill <michael.lill@posteo.de>
